title: Clubs
content: Which clubs run the fests and events at RR Campus?

comments.body:
PES University RRC fest - AATMATRISHA is not run by any club, its college management who organize it.

  
and many clubs do events, which one are you referring to?
Mainly hackathons and readathons and since atmatrisha is organised by the management, do they recruit volunteers for it or how does that work - potentially if I join PESU next year

okay, If i talk with respect to Aatmatrisha, they conduct volunteer recruitments 1-2 months prior to the fest.  
So, you can apply to any domain during that time. It will be a simple interview. 

for other hackathons or readathons, it depends on hackathon
